arts.ttl: GdS: Predicted XIs for Milan vs. Cremonese – Fofana and Loftus-Cheek keep spots
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan will kick off their 2025-26 Serie A campaign on Saturday night at San Siro, with Cremonese being the visitors. The selection news that dominated the headlines going into the league opener is the absence of Rafael Leao. He sustained a calf issue shortly after scoring the opening goal in Sunday’s Coppa Italia win […] The post GdS: Predicted XIs for Milan vs. Cremonese – Fofana and Loftus-Cheek keep spots appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Serie A opener preview: AC Milan vs Cremonese – Key players to watch
arts.sum: The 2025-26 Serie A season launches with a compelling clash at San Siro, where AC Milan face newly promoted Cremonese on August 23, 2025, at 7:45 p.m. BST. After a disappointing eighth-place finish last season, the Rossoneri, now under Massimiliano Allegri’s second tenure, are eager to reclaim their status as Italian football giants. Cremonese, fresh […]

arts.ttl: Milan’s road back to Europe starts tomorrow at San Siro vs Cremonese
arts.sum: There’s something different in the air when Milan return to San Siro. It’s not just about football, but about belonging. You can sense it in the faces of the fans back in the stands, as if that ritual had been missed more than any victory or trophy. Milan - Cremonese, beyond the scoreline, becomes the […]
